title: Sold T201 Mecca Double Folder - Speaker/Gardener
author: Kutcher55

posts.post_title: Sold T201 Mecca Double Folder - Speaker/Gardener
posts.post_content:
Selling this nice piece for $230 net to me including priority shipping.  I actually like this card? quite a bit, as it features a nice image of the great Tris Speaker and the back is also pretty compelling.  My main reason for selling is that I have OCD about large slabs and don't like the way it fits in storage.  Thank you.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/dXJfbkL.jpg[/img]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/kWWE0l2.jpg[/img]
Giving this one a bump.  A PSA 2 sold on ebay last night for $310.55 if anyone is looking for comps.  Thank you.
BREAKING NEWS:  This big ol slibbidy slab is now sold.
